summary.title: Exercise 1
summary.description:
The nature of the application is some kind of bulletin board.
There is a web server and db server pointing to a SQL database. The servers and data are hosted in the corporate data center.
Users connect using web browser.
Anonymous users can browse through information, registered users can post content.
Some functionality is only accessible through admin accounts. Admins don't have to be on the corporate network,
can connect from anywhere.
